challengeName: topcoder - Blog Post Tag Bug Fix
detailedRequirements:
The goal of this challenge is to fix the Tag page the new topcoder site (http://www.topcoder.com/). Right now it only shows header and footer section. 

Steps to reproduce the bug:
1. Go to http://www.topcoder.com/blog/
2. Select any post item 
3. Go towards the bottom of the blog post
4. Click on any tags 

Task Overview:
Your task is to make sure that the Tag page template will display all posts related to that specific Tag. The style and look and feel of this page should be similar to Blog main page (http://www.topcoder.com/blog/). 

Resources and Guidelines:
- Latest theme and plugin available on github https://github.com/topcoderinc/tc-site/
- Data is avaiable on https://github.com/topcoderinc/tc-site-data 
- Please follow the guideline in our Github repo at https://github.com/topcoderinc/tc-site/#readme 

Quick Installation guide :
1. Activate theme and plugin
2. Import provided XML file
3. Set home as front page
4. Set permalink to %post_name%
5. Please install site on local.topcoder.com (add to hosts file), so your local site can read tcsso and tcjwt cookie
finalSubmissionGuidelines:
- Please submit updated files and .diff file only
- Any new js or css file must be included in the registry. Learn about this on script and style registry section
- We will have winner to submit pull request once winner declared
